document_name: Decree no. 267-98 (amending Decree 85-98) on renewable energy generation
document_description: This decree amends Decree 85-98 on renewable energy generation. The amendments notably aim at 1) art. 10 easing the regulatory environment for renewable energy (including biomass and cogeneration) projects, 2) art. 12 set up tax exemptions, 3) art. 12 enable companies to sell their electricity from renewable sources more easily.
